message.entry: The specified field ''{0}'' is not in the Point.
FIRSTRECORD cannot be greater than {0,number,integer}.
{0} is not a valid Level name for this Point.
The specified record numbers for level {0,number,integer} must all be between 1 and {1,number,integer}.
NUMRECORDS ({0,number,integer}) cannot exceed the total number of records ({1,number,integer}) in the Vdata.
HINFO must be a scalar struct with a ''Type'' field.
Dataset type ''{0}'' is not recognized. Verify that the HINFO structure is correct. Consider using HDFINFO to obtain this structure.
HDF-EOS Point function {0} failed.
Could not retrieve information about field ''{0}'' in grid ''{1}''.
The field ''{0}'' is not present in the vdata.
Cannot perform a vertical subset with both ''DIM:{0}'' and ''{1}'' at the same time.
Multiple exclusive subsetting parameters were used.
The second input to HDFREAD should be char.
HINFO is not a valid structure describing {0} data. Consider using HDFINFO to obtain this structure.
''Level'' and ''Fields'' are required when reading HDF-EOS Point datasets.
HINFO must be a structure with fields ''Filename'', and ''Ref''. Consider using HDFINFO to obtain this structure.
HINFO is not a valid structure describing a Vdata. Consider using HDFINFO to obtain this structure.
Must use ''Fields'' parameter when reading HDF-EOS Grid data sets.
No data set found. Make sure the filename and data set name are correct.
The ''Tile'' parameter was specified, but ''{0}'' is not defined on a tiled grid.
This usage of HDFREAD is obsolete and may be removed in a future version. Consider using IMREAD instead.
Failed to read data for the given level.
A Vgroup is a container for other data sets. A specific data set must be specified.
Only one field at a time can be read from a Grid or a Swath.
